allow:
Bash(git -C "C:/Users/B/projects" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Full project state - UI fixes, config preservation, cleanup

jlmops:
- AdminProjectsView: Task list column width optimization, entity sort, scope filter row
- ManagerDashboardView_v2: 2-week calendar \(2 rows\), calendar as default view
- SetupConfig: Preserve runtime state values on rebuild \(brurya, mailchimp dates\)

Project structure:
- Remove legacy backend-scripts, frontend-scripts folders
- Remove temporary CSV/data files
- Add content, business, marketing, website folders with CLAUDE.md guides

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/B/projects/jlmops" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf: Dashboard optimization - read sheets once per request

- Refactor WebAppDashboardV2_getData to read all sheets at top, pass data to helpers
- Refactor WebAppDashboardV2_getManagerData with same pattern
- Add _rowsToObjects helper for sheet-to-object conversion
- Add _safeDate helper for proper Date serialization to JSON
- Fix SheetAccessor config key typo \(logs not log\)
- Reduces sheet reads from ~15 to 4 per dashboard load

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
